originalTitle: Leader of South Africa's second largest party will not seek re-election
title: Leader of South Africa's second largest party will not seek re-election
content: The surprise move may threaten the stability of the coalition government of which the DA is a key partner.

originalTitle: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of ex-Libyan leader, reportedly shot dead
title: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of ex-Libyan leader, reportedly shot dead
content: The 53-year-old, who was once widely seen as the second most powerful person in Libya, was killed on Tuesday according to Libyan media.

originalTitle: Why a beauty spot in South Africa could be about to run out of water
title: Why a beauty spot in South Africa could be about to run out of water
content: Official estimates suggest that around 55% of the town's drinkable water is lost to leaking pipes.

originalTitle: ICE agents have no operational police role in Winter Olympics: Italy
title: ICE agents have no operational police role in Winter Olympics: Italy
content: 'We won't see anything on national territory that resembles what's been seen in the US,' Italy's interior minister says.

title: Guardiola on Palestinian struggle and ICE protests in football briefing
content: In Manchester Cityâ€™s pre-match press conference on Tuesday, manager Guardiola spoke about Palestinians in Gaza and ICE.

originalTitle: Can US-Iran diplomacy work? Inside the narrow window for talks
title: Can US-Iran diplomacy work? Inside the narrow window for talks
content: Iran wants talks with the US to stabilise before inviting regional nations to join, as Trump sends mixed messages.

originalTitle: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
title: Russian attacks on Ukraine energy sites 'particularly depraved', UK PM Starmer says
content: The UK leader's comments came after Russia renewed its attacks on power plants and critical infrastructure in Ukraine.

originalTitle: Israeli strikes kill 17 in Gaza, hospitals say, after soldier wounded by gunfire
title: Israeli strikes kill 17 in Gaza, hospitals say, after soldier wounded by gunfire
content: Hospitals say six children were among those killed in strikes that Israel's military says it launched after a gun attack on its troops.

originalTitle: 'Painful times in my marriage' - Melinda French Gates reacts to ex-husband in Epstein files
title: 'Painful times in my marriage' - Melinda French Gates reacts to ex-husband in Epstein files
content: She said her ex-husband and others named in the Epstein files need to answer whatever questions remain.

originalTitle: 'Years in the making' - are Arsenal ready to shed 'nearly-men' tag?
title: 'Years in the making' - are Arsenal ready to shed 'nearly-men' tag?
content: Arsenal have moved a step closer to winning their first major silverware since 2020 by beating Chelsea 4-2 on aggregate in the Carabao Cup semi-final.

originalTitle: Chelsea adopt Match of the Day tactic to stop Arsenal set-piece threat
title: Chelsea adopt Match of the Day tactic to stop Arsenal set-piece threat
content: Despite losing their Carabao Cup semi-final, Chelsea attempted a new way of stopping Arsenal set-pieces - just days after a similar suggestion on Match of the Day.

originalTitle: 'Playing with fire' catches up with 10-man Hearts - McInnes
title: 'Playing with fire' catches up with 10-man Hearts - McInnes
content: Head coach Derek McInnes concedes that Premiership leaders Hearts were punished for "playing with fire" as a third red card in five matches contributes to a 1-0 defeat at St Mirren.
